mapper.insert: insert into notice (title, content, writer, filename, filepath) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{filename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filepath, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over(order by root, step desc) no, name, n.* from notice n inner join member m on n.writer = m.userid order by no desc) n where no between #{beginList} and #{endList}
select name, notice.* from notice inner join member m on notice.writer = m.userid where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update notice set readcnt = readcnt+1 where id=#{id}
